div.head: Hed Court
div.p:
Curia capitalis balliuorum burgj de Abirdenne Tenta in pre
torio eiusdem Sexto die mensis Octobris Anno Dominj millesimo quin
gentesimo quinto

Eodem die gilbertus menyeis per balliuos consules et communitatem electus
fuit in Officium prepositure Pro Anno Instanti prestito solito
Juramento

Eodem die Jacobus Colisone Johannes mar Johannes Ratre et
Alexander gray vnanum consensu et assensu prepositj consilij et
communitatis electj fuerunt in Officium balliuorum dictj burgj prestitis
Solitis Juramentis

The said day It was statut and Ordanit be the alderman
bailyes counsaile and Communite for the Commoun Weill gud and
proffit for the toune that the sergeandis wiffis sale nocht by
wictalis mair thane will Suffice thame self in the mercat
nor vteuth' within the burgh' and gif the sergeandis or ony ane
of thame happinis to failye in the execucioun' of thair Office or to do
or committe it that accordis thame nocht to do and beis tuis' conuict' tharof
thar office sale waik furthtwitht and thai secludit and expellit thar
fra but ony langar prorssus

Eodem die Normannus leslie Willelmus scrimgeor Andreas Nachtj et
Johannes Cuk electj fuerunt in Officium sergeandorum dictj burgj
pro Anno Instanti secundum tenorem statutum precedens prestitis solitis
Juramentis

Dauid lame amerciatur in defectu presencie
Johannes Watsone in grantuly amerciatur in defectu presencie
Mores' fergousoun' in defectu presencie
Andreas Watsone in cullan in defectu presencie
Thomas Dauesounse in defectu presencie
Georgius fentone in defectu presencie
Alexander Joffrasoun' in defectu presencie
Alexander leitht in defectu presencie
Patricius arthour in defectu presencie
Duncanus Andersoune in defectu presencie
Robertus Danesoune in banquhordewny in defectu presencie
W Richerdsoune in fordis' in defectu presencie
thomas laisk in newburgh' in defectu presencie
Walterus lang in monicabok in defectu presencie
Andreas baxtar in newburgh' in defectu presencie
Richardus Watsone in fordis' in defectu presencie
Dauid andarsone in defectu presencie
Andreas Johnestoun' in fingask in defectu presencie

Eodem die tribus processibus perlectis deductis per dominum Johannem malisone de et
super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdem terre penitus quondam Richardum young'
Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex orientali parte iusdem vici inter terram
magistri alexandri cullane Rectoris de oyn' ex australi ex vna et terram quondam Roberti
Cullane ex boreali partibus ab altera et communias vias regias versus oriens et occidens
in defectu solucionis vnius annuum redditus octo solidorum sibi a longo tempore
debito et non soluto vnde dictus dominus Johannes peciit a balliuis sibi fieri de
dicta terra Juris et Justicie Complementum secundum tenorem suj processus precedens Et
Consequenter dominus Dauid liele prelocutor dicti domini Johannis porrexit plegium In manibus
Willelmi scrimgeor seriandi quod ipse dominus Johannes proprietatem et possessionem dicte
terre cum pertinenciis legittime recuperauit In defectu solucionis annuj Redditus pluri
bat vnde hora die legittime expecta omnibus Interesse habenti et nullo comparenti nec
opponenti decretum fuit per Curiam et datum pro Judicio per os Alexandri Jofrason'
Judicatoris Curie quod Ipse dominus Johannes Causam suam obtinuit in recuperacione
proprietatis dicte terre Cum pertinenciis Sibi quibus dictus Johannes peciit Instrumentum Sigillum
balliuorum tunc presencium Roborandi videlicet Jacobi Colisone Johannis Ratre et Alexandrum gray
Testibus domino Dauid Waus capellane Andrea steuinsone Dauid mar' Juniore thoma lammyn
tone Dauid Coupar et ormundo leslie seriando Actis in dicto pretorio hora quasi xij in me
redie Johannes Stirueling notarius ad hoc teste manu propria

Eodem die Accedens ad barram Andreas Stevinsone et protestabatur in forma
Juris pro vno annuo Redditu xij solidorum sibi annuatim debito de terra anteriore
Alexandri crag Jacente in vico de skulhile ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terram
Willelmj belty ex orientali ex vna et terram Willelmum moir' ex occidentali partibus
ab altera Ad quam terram Accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius
processus Testibus Waltero Wischeart Johanne paule et Johane Cuk
seriando

head.add: processus magstri Dauid menyheis collector capellanorum collegij de Abirdene

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir magister Dauid menyheis procurator ac
collector capellanorum collegij sancti nicholaij de Abirdene et protstabatur in forma
Juris pro vno annuo redditu vigintj solidorum vsualis monete scocie dictis capellanis
a longo tempore debito et non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam Alexandrj
chamer Jacente in vico inferiore ecclesie ex orientali parte eiusdem inter terram
dictj quondam Alexandri ex boreali ex vna et terram quondam thome prat
ex australi partibus ab altera et communionem viam Regiam versus oriens Ad
quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quod balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius
processus Testibus philippo Kelly Willelmo blytht et Andrea nachty sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad battam discretus vir dominus Andreas collisoun'
capellanus altaris sancti michaelis infra ecclesiam parrochialem Sancti
nicholai de Abirdene situati et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro annuo
Redditu octo solidorum de quadam terra vasta quondam Willelmum nory
Jacente in vico superiore ecclesie ex austali parte eiusdem inter terram quondam
ipsius Willelmum ex ex occidentali partibus ab altera et communionem viam
regiam versus boream Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo
presentauit in curia tanquam 3o die huius processus testibus Alexandro mathousone
philippo Kelly Willelmi blytht et Andrea nachtj seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram distrectus vir magistri thomas chamer'
capellanus altaris sancte marie virginis Infra ecclesiam sanctj nicholaij
de Abirdene situati et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu
v s' monete scocie de quadam terra vasta quondam Willelmum nory Jacente
in vico superiore ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem inter terram ipsius
quondam Willelmj nory ex occidentali et terrentem communionem ex orientali
et communionem viam regiam ex boreali Ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo
presentauit in curia tanquam 3o die huius processsus Testibus Alexandro mathouson'
phillippo Kelly Willelmo blytht et Andrea nachtj seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Andreas collison'
capellanus altaris sanctj stephani prothomartris et protestatus fuit
fuit in forma Juris pro vno annua redditu quatuor solidorum sibi et dicto
altari dnnuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra
vasta quondam Willelmum tulideff Jacente in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte
eiusdem inter terram Johannis collison' ex orientali ex vna et terram
Johannis moir' ex occidentali partibus ab altera Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis
in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus
Dauid mar Johanne balgerschaw et ormundo lesly sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir magistri Dauid menyeis capellanus
altaris sancti Duthaci confessoris infra ecclesiam sancti nicholaij de Abirdene
situati et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu sex solidorum
annuatim sibi debito et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta
quondam Willelmum Tulideff Jacente in vico furcarum inter terram Johannis
collisone ex orientali ex vna et terram Johannis mot' ex occidentali partibus
ab altera Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia
tanquam die huius processus Testibus Dauid mar' Johanne
balgerschaw et Ormundo lesly seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir magister Alexander
bisset capellanus perpetuus altaris Sancti sanguinis infra ecclesiam
beati nicholaij de Abirdene situati et pretestatus fuit in fora Juris
pro vno annuo Redditu sibi et dicto altarij annuatim a
longo tempore debito et non soluto de quadam terra vasta Jacente
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam die huius
processus testibuset
sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Alexandrum Rauff procurator
capellanorum ecclesie cathedralis abirdonensis et protestatus fuit in forma
Juris pro vno annuo redditu trium solidorum et quatuor denariorum monete
scocie dictis capellanis annuatim debito et non soluto de quadam terra
vasta quondam Patricij Jacente infra dictum burgum in le Rattone Raw
inter terram thome gray carnifex ex parte occidentali et terram
alexander scherar ex orientali et communionem viam regiam versus austrum
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo
die huius processus Testibus Dauid mar Johanne balgerschaw et ormundo lesly
seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes Arnot
minister domus sancte trinitatis et protestabatur pro vno annuo redditu v solidorum
sibi et dicto loco annuatim debito et non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam
Andree lammyntone Jacente in vico Nauium ex occidentali parte eiusdem inter terram
quondam dominum thome heruy ex orientali et communionem viam regiam ex occidentali
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam 3o die huius
processus Testibus philippo Kelly Willelmo blytht et Andrea nachtj
sergeando

head.add: processus magristi Dauid menyeis de terra gilbertj Riburn'

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir magister Dauid menyeis capellanus
altaris sanctj Eligij infra ecclesiam sanctj nicholaij de Abirdene situati
Et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu de quadam
terra vasta quondam gilberti Riburne Jacente in vico Nauium ex orientali
parte eiusdem inter terram thome chamer ex orientali ex vna et terram
quondam Andree lammyntone ex boreali partibus ab altera et terram Johannis chamer
ex australi Et terram communionem viam regiam ex occidentali sibi et
dicto altari annuatim debito et non soluto Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis
in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus
philippo Kelly Willelmo blytht et Andrea nachtj seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes Reid' capellanus altarum sanctorum ninianj
priorj et laurencij martiris Infra ecclesiam parrochialiem sancti nicholaij de abirdene et protestabatur in forma
Juris vno annuo redditu quinque solidorum sibi annuatim de quadam terra vasta quondam
Dauid galychtlie Jacente in vico nauium ex occidentali parte eiusdem vico inter terram
quondam Willelmum Kynidy constabilarij de Aberdene ex boreali et terram quondam Richardi
craufurd' ex occidentali in defectum solucionis deictj annuj redditu Ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo
presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Alexandro pottar et Andrea
beltar et Johanne cuk seriando

The vij day of the monetht of October the yeir of god' jM vc and fiwe
yeris thomas Waus Dauid brois' and Williame Wallace prisit ane hed
pendes ane chenye ane kirsp of ane siluer belt pertenyng to Johnne litstar'
and prisit it to thomas leslie for ix s' and vj d' the vnce quhilkis weit
v vnce and ane quartar

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Octauo die mensis
Octobris Anno quo supra

Eodem die Johannes vscheart allatarius conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam
ex ore Johannes cullan prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Richardj Wilsone Cuj
emendabit vt Jura volunt Et soluet liberam cere ad lumen sanctj san
guinis

Eodem die Johannes Cummyne conuictus fuit per dictam assisam
ex ore dictj Johannis cullan prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio curie
manu fortj capiendo henricum Wilsone de curia Cuj emendabit
ut Jura volunt

Curia gilde burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio burgj de Abirdene
vndecimotercio die mensis Octobris Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo
quinto

Eodem die Andreas cullan et thomas Waus electj fuerunt decanj gilde pro anno
Instansti prestitis solitis Juramentis

Johannes leslie Alexander menyes
Dauid menyeis Alexander red'
Johannes cullan Johannes colisone
Andreas cullan Alexander mar
thomas chamer Johannes Wormet
Andreas murray Duncanus colison'
Johannes Ruthirfurd' thomas leslie
thomas Waus Dauid steuart
patricius leslie Robertus Crag
Dauid mar' Willelmus futhes
Williame Wormet patricius Red'
georgius bisset Alexander matheson'

Matheus branche Dauid fynne Dauid brois' Jacobus Kennertj Johannes
andersoune gilbertus litstar' Andreas stevinsone Johannez Auchneiff
Andreas litstar Willelmus vmfray Johannes thomsoune Andreas lowe
et Jacobus gurlawe burgenses dictj burgj electj fuerunt et onus super
se reciperunt medians suis Juramentis ad appreciandum carnes
bouinas quolibet sabato ante merediem cum ballivis aut vno balliuorum
dictj burgj pro communi bono et vtilitate burgj vsque ad curiam capitalem
festum Sanctj michaelis Inmediatee sequenti

head.add: Auditores compotj decanorum gilde et magistrorum fabrice ecclesie

div.p:
Eodem die Johannes leslie Alexander Red' Dauid menyeis Johannes cullan et
Andreas cullan electj fuerunt ad Audiendum compotum decanorum gilde
et magistrorum fabrice ecclesie considerandum allocandum et cetera secundum suas
consciencias mediantes corporali Juramento

Johannes leslie Alexander menyes
Alexander Red' Dauid menyes
Johannes cullan Andreas cullan
Johannes colisoun' Duncanus colisone
thomas Waus thomas leslie
patricius leslie Dauid mar'
Alexander mar Willelmus futhes
Willelmus Wormet georgius bisset
electj fuerunt pro anno In
stanti prestitus solitis Juramentis

The said day the alderman bailyes and counsaill gawe grantit and assig
nit to thome chamer ther clerkschip of the gastraw quartar quhilk Johnne
fiff hed of befor witht ale commodities and proffitis pertyni pertening
tharto witht the tuenty schillingis of ser William couparis quartar
for ane yer hereftir the said thomas doing and excersing gud seruice tharfor
in the quier and vteuthe according to the said Office

The said day Donald baxstar grantit him awand to Dauid brois' xiij s'
iiij d' vsuale money of scotland' quhilkis the bailyes chargit him to
pay within terme of lawe et cetera

The said day the balyes assignit monunday that nixt cummis to Donald
baxtar to bring ane pot of vmquhill gilbert Riburnis quhilkis he hes for
to pay the annuell Runnyn of vpone the said g vmquhile gilbertis land'
liand' in the schipraw and to be apprisit for part of pament of the
said annuell Or ellis to preiw the pot lyand to him in wed
of certane money

Willelmus scrimgeor seriandus
evin quartar
Alexander stablar Et nicholaius fynne
Andreas nachtj seriandus grene quartar
Alexander brabner et Alexander moresoune
Normannus lesly seriandus
Crukit quartar
Willelmus meldrum et
Johannes cuk
Johannes cuk seriandus
ffuty quartar
gilbertus tulidef et Alexander moresoune

The said day It was statut and ordanit be the alderman balyes
and counsaile that ale the candile makaris within this burgh' sale
male candill weill drunt and smale wekit for iij d' Ilkan li'
ane candill for j d' ij for ane d' and iij for j d' vnder the pane
of brekin of commone ordinance

The said day It was statut and ordanit be the alderman bailyes
and counsale that ale thte broustaris withtin this burgh' free or free
mennis wiffis sale brewe ande sell gud and Sufficient prouabill
aill for viij d' the gallone ande vnefree personis for vj d' the gallon'
and sale haue aill ay Reddy to serue the toune and sale sell
nay aill derar thane Is set be the quynnarisvnder the
pane of the brakin of commone ordinance and vnder the pane
of lawe

The said day It was statut and ordanit be the alderman balyes and
counsaile that ale the flescharis within this burgh' sale haue
fles' ay Reddy to serue the toune' and at thai sale sele nay beff'
fles' quhill it be prisit be the Suorne prisaris of the tone and sall
sell it nay darrar thane It is prisit vnder the pane of lawe and
braking of commone ordinance

The said day It was diusit and ordanit be the alderman bailyes and'
counsaile that thar salbe gevin tile out Souerane lord in propin sex par
torchis ane dusane of prekatis iij dusane of syis of walx ane dusane
li' of scorcheatisge and alsmekle' wyne as the mastir of sellar ples'
to tak tile his hienes

The said day it was diuisit and ordanit ij par torches' vj prikatis
and ane galloune of wyne salbe propinit to my lord' Justice
and Inlikuis' to my lord thesaurar ij par torches' vj prek
atis and ane gallon' of wyn'

the said day the alderman bailyes and counsaile conducit and feit
Watte strathachin to remane and serue the quartar of the castale
yet pertenyng to Johnne of mar in the queyr and vteucht as efferis
ane of the four clerkis witht consent of Johnne of mar bailye his
brudir for the proffitis of the said half of the said clerkschip ande for
his met circuilie amang diuers' counsaile of the toune

The said' day It was statut and ordanit be the aldirman balyeis and
Counsale that ale the baxtaris of this burghe sale bak tua penny
breid' of quhet cleyne flour' weile bakin weing xxvj vnce
and penny bred' weing xiij vnce quhile the tone be forthir auisit

Eodem die mariota sponsa Johannis blak counicta fuit per assisam Juratam
ex ore patricium leslie prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio cristine lilburne
Cuj emendabit vt Jura volunt Et dicta cristina pro perturbio
dicte mariote Cuj emendabit vt Jura volunt et cetera
